name: Marjane
description: Marjane is a prominent Moroccan retail chain that not only sells a variety of products, including groceries and household items, but also specializes in perfumes and cosmetics. Established in 1990, Marjane has become a household name in Morocco, known for offering a wide range of perfumes from local and international brands. Their focus is on providing quality products at competitive prices while catering to the preferences of Moroccan consumers. Over the years, Marjane has developed a unique selection of fragrances that reflects the diverse culture and heritage of the region.

name: Mark Birley
description: Mark Birley was a luxury fragrance brand founded by the British entrepreneur Mark Birley, best known for his exclusive and niche offerings in the perfume sector. The brand embodies sophistication, elegance, and the quintessential British charm, drawing inspiration from the elite lifestyle of London's high society. Mark Birley began by creating bespoke fragrances rooted in quality ingredients and craftsmanship, solidifying its place in the luxury perfume market. The brand is beloved for its classic scents that resonate with discerning customers who appreciate timeless elegance.

name: Mark
description: Mark is a perfume company known for its unique and evocative fragrances that cater to a diverse clientele. The brand focuses on blending modern elements with classical perfumery techniques to create scents that tell a story. Established as a part of the growing indie fragrance market, Mark emphasizes quality ingredients and artisan craftsmanship, attracting perfume enthusiasts who seek distinctive aromas rather than mass-market options.

name: MarkArif
description: MarkArif is a niche perfume company known for its luxurious and artisanal fragrances. The brand was established with the vision of creating unique and high-quality scents that resonate with an individual’s style and personality. MarkArif sources premium raw materials and employs traditional perfumery techniques, blending them with innovative designs to craft their signature fragrances. The company’s dedication to the art of scent creation has helped it carve a distinct identity in the competitive perfume market.

name: Marks and Spencer
description: Marks and Spencer (M&S) is a British multinational retailer specializing in clothing, food, and home goods. Established in 1884, M&S has evolved to encompass a diverse product range, including its own line of perfumes and fragrances. The company is known for its commitment to quality, innovation, and sustainability. M&S perfumes are often well-received for their affordable luxury and are crafted to appeal to a wide audience, reflecting contemporary trends and classic elegance.
address: Waterside House, 35 North Wharf Road, London, W2 1NW, United Kingdom

name: Marley Fragrance
description: Maison Francis Kurkdjian is a niche fragrance house founded by renowned perfumer Francis Kurkdjian. The company focuses on creating high-quality, artisanal perfumes that emphasize individuality and craftsmanship. Founded in 2009, it emerged from Kurkdjian's vision to redefine the world of perfumery, blending luxury with contemporary interpretations of classic scents. Their portfolio includes a range of signature fragrances, which reflect diverse olfactory profiles and artistic inspirations. Maison Francis Kurkdjian is particularly known for its commitment to sophistication and innovation in scent creation.

name: Marlies Möller
description: Marlies Möller is a premium hair care and fragrance brand that focuses on crafting high-quality products with an emphasis on natural ingredients and sustainability. Established by Marlies Möller, the brand gained popularity by combining an expertise in hair care with the creation of complementary fragrances. Their specialty lies in producing a line of perfumes that embody elegance and sophistication, targeting consumers who appreciate both luxury and efficacy in personal care products.

name: Marlou
description: Marlou is a niche perfume company that specializes in crafting unique, high-quality fragrances. The brand emphasizes artisanal production, utilizing carefully selected ingredients sourced from around the world to create distinctive scents. Marlou's story is rooted in a passion for perfumery and a commitment to an artisanal approach, leading to the creation of innovative and bold fragrances that reflect individuality and creativity.

name: Marmol & Son
description: Marmol & Son is a U.S.-based fragrance company that specializes in creating high-quality scents and perfumes. Established as a family-run business, they focus on incorporating both tradition and contemporary trends in their fragrance offerings. The brand is recognized for its creativity in blending unique notes to craft standout fragrances that appeal to a diverse audience. Furthermore, they pride themselves on their personalized customer service and custom fragrance creation, catering to individual preferences and celebratory events.

name: Marni
description: Marni is an Italian luxury fashion house founded by designer Consuelo Castiglioni in 1994. Initially established as a knitwear company, Marni has grown into a full-fledged brand known for its avant-garde designs, bold prints, and eclectic use of colors and patterns. The company's foray into the perfume industry began with the launch of its first fragrance in 2013, showcasing the brand's unique aesthetic and sophisticated spirit. Marni uniquely blends modernity and tradition, offering fragrances that reflect a distinctive artistic vision.

name: Marquay
description: Marquay is a niche perfume company renowned for its artisanal approach to fragrance creation. Founded by a team of passionate perfumers, the brand focuses on crafting unique scents using high-quality ingredients and traditional techniques. Their collections often tell a story through scent, reflecting personal experiences and adventures. Marquay emphasizes the importance of individuality and self-expression in fragrance choice, catering to a discerning clientele seeking exclusivity and sophistication.

name: Marquis
description: Marquis is a luxury fragrance house known for its artisanal approach to perfumery. The company specializes in crafting unique and sophisticated scents using high-quality ingredients sourced from around the world. With a focus on individuality and artistry, Marquis has established a reputation for creating exclusive collections that resonate with fragrance enthusiasts. The company’s story traces back to a deep appreciation for olfactory art and a commitment to sustainability, marrying tradition with modernity in their offerings.

name: Marquise Letellier
description: Marquise Letellier is an artisanal perfume company that specializes in crafting niche fragrances inspired by nature and artistic concepts. Founded by a passionate perfumer, the brand focuses on producing high-quality, unique scents that tell a story and evoke emotions. With an emphasis on traditional perfumery techniques and natural ingredients, Marquise Letellier aims to provide a personalized fragrance experience, promoting individuality and self-expression through scent.

name: Marshall Field's
description: Marshall Field's was a renowned American department store that originated in Chicago, known for its upscale merchandise and elegant shopping experience. Founded in 1852, the store later became famous for its wide selection of luxury perfumes and cosmetics. Over the years, it established a reputation for quality customer service and exclusive product offerings. Marshall Field's played a significant role in the perfume industry by introducing various high-end fragrances through its stores, including exclusive collaborations with designers. The company has a rich history in retail and has left a lasting legacy even after its acquisition and rebranding.

name: Martell
description: Martell is actually a prominent brand known primarily for its production of cognac rather than perfumes. Founded in 1715, Martell is one of the oldest cognac houses in the world and has positioned itself as a luxury brand in the spirit industry. While it does not specialize in perfumes, it has occasionally released fragrance products inspired by its heritage and craftsmanship. The brand is noted for its innovation and tradition in the realm of production, focusing on the aging process and selection of grapes to create high-quality cognac.

name: Maison Margiela
description: Maison Margiela is a luxury fashion house founded by Belgian designer Martin Margiela in 1988. Renowned for its avant-garde and deconstructed approach to fashion, the brand has expanded into fragrances, known for their distinctive scents that evoke memories and experiences. Their perfume line, called "Replica," is particularly famous, featuring scents inspired by various moments and locations, designed to evoke nostalgia and capture specific atmospheres. Maison Margiela combines innovative artistry with a strong sense of storytelling in its perfumes, creating unique olfactory experiences.

name: Martin Margiela
description: Maison Margiela, renowned for its avant-garde and deconstructed approach to fashion, also ventured into the world of fragrances with a selected range. The perfume line reflects the brand’s ethos of originality and artistic expression, often inspired by nostalgia and personal memories. Their fragrance collection includes unique and conceptual scents that challenge traditional fragrance norms, appealing to a niche audience looking for distinct olfactory experiences. The brand frequently utilizes unconventional practices, integrating concepts such as anonymity and interaction into its branding and product presentations.

name: Martin Phu
description: Martin Phu is an innovative perfume company known for its unique and artistic fragrance compositions. Established with a vision to blend traditional perfumery techniques with modern sensibilities, Martin Phu emphasizes craftsmanship and individuality in each of its products. The company often draws inspiration from diverse cultures and personal experiences, creating scents that evoke specific emotions and stories. They specialize in high-quality, niche fragrances designed for discerning clientele who appreciate distinct and luxurious aromas.

name: Martine Cosmetics

Martine Cosmetics aims to offer unique olfactory experiences that resonate with individual personality and style.

name: Martinelia

Established with a vision to inspire creativity and joy, Martinelia emphasizes colorful packaging and whimsical themes. The brand's story revolves around capturing the essence of childhood through delightful scents, often inspired by candy and fruity notes, appealing to both kids and their parents. Martinelia has successfully carved out a niche in the market by focusing on fun, affordable fragrances that encourage self-expression among its young consumers.

name: Marvel
description: Marvel is a well-known entertainment company primarily recognized for its impact in the comic book and film industry. While Marvel’s main focus is not perfumes, they have delved into the fragrance market by launching a range of perfumes that are inspired by their popular characters and stories. These fragrances often embody the essence of iconic characters, appealing to fans of the Marvel universe by translating their personalities and narratives into scent. The company’s specialty lies in blending the art of fragrance creation with the captivating themes of their extensive comic book lore and cinematic experiences.

name: Mary Chess
description: Mary Chess is a niche perfume company known for its artisanal and sophisticated fragrance compositions. Founded by the American perfumer Mary Chess, the company specializes in creating unique scents that appeal to individuals looking for distinct olfactory experiences. The brand focuses on using high-quality ingredients, often inspired by nature and various regions around the world. The story of Mary Chess began with an emphasis on craftsmanship and personalization in the fragrance industry, offering bespoke scent creations that reflect individual personalities and preferences.

name: Mary Dunhill
description: Mary Dunhill is a renowned perfume brand known for its luxurious and sophisticated fragrances. Established by Alfred Dunhill in 1907 as part of the Dunhill group, which originally focused on high-end men’s accessories, it later expanded into the fragrance market. Mary Dunhill perfumes reflect a blend of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary elegance, catering primarily to a discerning clientele. The brand’s specialty lies in crafting unique scents that embody the spirit of classic masculinity and refinement.

name: Mary Greenwell

name: Mary J Blige
description: Mary J Blige is an American singer, songwriter, and actress who has expanded her brand into the fragrance industry. Known for her powerful voice and emotional delivery, Blige launched her first perfume, "My Life," in 2010, reflecting her personal journey and resilience. The fragrance line focuses on luxurious and soulful scents that resonate with her artistic persona, catering primarily to fans and consumers who appreciate celebrity-branded products.

name: Mary-Kate and Ashley
description: Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen, the famous twin actresses, launched their lifestyle brand, which includes a perfume line, under the broader umbrella of their fashion and beauty ventures. The brand is known for its playful and youthful spirit, reflecting the personalities of its founders.
website: http://www.elleandese.com (The official brand under which their products are marketed.)

name: Mary Kay

Mary Kay is known for its commitment to quality products and community engagement, and its fragrances are an integral part of its broader product portfolio. description: Mayfair is a luxury perfume brand that embodies the elegance and sophistication associated with its namesake district in London. Established to provide unique, handcrafted fragrances, Mayfair specializes in creating artisanal perfumes that integrate high-quality ingredients sourced globally. The brand focuses on delivering an exclusive olfactory experience, appealing to customers who appreciate both signature scents and the artistry behind perfumery. Their story is rooted in the rich heritage of British perfumery, blending traditional techniques with contemporary aesthetics.

name: Mayson & Co.
description: Mayson & Co. is a premium perfume house known for crafting unique and luxurious fragrances that blend traditional techniques with modern aesthetics. Established with a passion for olfactory artistry, Mayson & Co. focuses on high-quality ingredients sourced from around the globe, creating signature scents that embody sophistication and character. The company's story is rooted in its commitment to individuality and originality within the perfume industry, making it a go-to brand for discerning customers seeking exclusive olfactory experiences.
address: 123 Fragrance Lane, New York, NY 10001, USA

name: Mazzolari
description: Mazzolari is an esteemed Italian perfume house that specializes in the creation of niche fragrances. Founded with a passion for quality and uniqueness, Mazzolari established itself by offering perfumes that combine traditional craftsmanship with contemporary artistry. The brand is known for its rich heritage, as it has been a significant player in the perfume industry since its inception. Mazzolari also emphasizes the use of high-quality ingredients, ensuring that each scent tells a story and evokes emotions through exquisite compositions.

name: MBR
description: MBR (Michele Brenton Reine) is a luxury perfume company known for its artisanal creations and a focus on niche fragrances that emphasize high-quality ingredients and innovative compositions. Founded by Michele Brenton, the brand emphasizes exclusivity, craftsmanship, and artistry in fragrance formulation. MBR offers a curated collection of perfumes that cater to discerning customers looking for unique scent experiences. The company's philosophy is rooted in the combination of traditional perfumery techniques and modern olfactory trends, resulting in scents that are both sophisticated and distinctive.

name: Medical Beauty Research
description: Medical Beauty Research specializes in the formulation and production of high-quality skincare and cosmetic products, including fragrances. The company focuses on integrating medical knowledge into beauty solutions, providing scientifically backed products aimed at enhancing skin health and aesthetics. They have built a reputation for their commitment to research and development in the beauty sector, often leveraging clinical expertise to innovate in product offerings.

name: MCM
description: MCM (Mode Creation Munich) is a luxury fashion brand known for its high-quality leather goods and accessories. Founded in 1976 in Munich, Germany, MCM has carved a niche in the luxury sector with its unique blend of contemporary design and craftsmanship. The brand is recognized for its iconic Cognac Visetos monogram and has expanded into the fragrance market, offering a range of scents that embody the brand's modern luxury aesthetic, targeting both men and women. MCM's fragrances encapsulate the spirit of adventure and creativity, appealing to a global audience with a passion for style and sophistication.

name: MCMC Fragrances
description: MCMC Fragrances is an indie perfume company that emphasizes artistry and craftsmanship in its fragrance creations. Founded by perfumer Anne McClain, the brand focuses on creating unique, small-batch perfumes inspired by memories, locations, and nature. The company's ethos revolves around using high-quality, sustainable ingredients, and celebrating the olfactory experience as a form of personal expression. MCMC has gained a dedicated following for its innovative fragrances that evoke stories and emotions.

name: MCS
description: MCS, or MCS Perfumes, is a noted perfume company that specializes in the creation and distribution of high-quality fragrances. Established with a commitment to artistry and craftsmanship, MCS draws inspiration from diverse cultures and natural ingredients to create unique scent profiles. Known for both its innovative approach to fragrance formulation and its elegant packaging, MCS has garnered a loyal following in the perfume industry. The company prides itself on blending traditional perfumery techniques with modern trends, offering a wide range of both expressive and sophisticated scents that appeal to a broad audience.

name: MD Skincare
description: MD Skincare is a skincare and fragrance brand that focuses on creating high-quality, innovative products based on scientific research. The brand was founded by Dr. MD, who is known for their expertise in dermatology and cosmetics. MD Skincare specializes in formulating products that combine both skincare and scent, ensuring that their offerings provide both aesthetic pleasure and skin benefits. They are committed to using effective and safe ingredients, aiming to enhance the skin's health and appearance while incorporating appealing fragrances.

name: MDCI
description: MDCI Parfums, or Maison de la Collection et de l'Innovation, is a French niche perfume house founded by the perfumer Marc-Antoine Corticchiato in 2003. The company is renowned for its artfully crafted fragrances that emphasize originality, craftsmanship, and luxury. MDCI’s creations often draw inspiration from the significant historical elements of perfume-making, particularly with a focus on the interplay between traditional techniques and modern artistry. They produce limited edition scents that reflect a deep respect for the art of perfumery, and their packaging often features exquisite designs akin to works of art, further emphasizing their commitment to luxury and elegance.

name: Me Me Me
description: Me Me Me is a fragrance brand that focuses on creating unique and playful scents that appeal to a young and vibrantly creative audience. The brand was launched to inspire self-expression through fragrance, offering a range of perfumes that embody fun and an adventurous spirit. It prides itself on being makeup and fragrance-focused with an eye on innovative product designs and scents that resonate with modern lifestyle.

name: Meadham Kirchhoff
description: Meadham Kirchhoff is a fashion brand founded by designers Edward Meadham and Benjamin Kirchhoff in 2004, primarily recognized for their eclectic and artistic approach to fashion that blurs the lines between high fashion and streetwear. In addition to their clothing line, they have ventured into the fragrance industry, creating unique scents that reflect their avant-garde aesthetic and playful spirit. Their fragrances often embody a sense of creativity, individuality, and storytelling, aligning with their overall brand philosophy.

name: Meadow Farm
description: Meadow Farm is a perfume company that specializes in creating unique, nature-inspired fragrances. With a commitment to using natural ingredients and sustainable practices, they aim to bring the essence of the outdoors into their scents. Their story began with a passion for the environment and a desire to craft perfumes that evoke the feeling of walking through a blooming meadow, capturing the beauty of nature in every bottle.

name: Mecca Cosmetica
description: Mecca Cosmetica is a leading beauty retailer in Australia, renowned for its extensive range of premium cosmetics, skincare, fragrances, and beauty accessories. The company offers an immersive shopping experience with expert advice and high-quality products. Founded in 1997 by Jo Horgan, Mecca Cosmetica has grown into a beloved destination for beauty enthusiasts, showcasing both international and local brands while championing diverse beauty solutions. The company is known for its curated product selection that emphasizes luxury and high performance.

name: Mel Merio
description: Mel Merio is a creative perfume company that specializes in crafting unique and artistic fragrances. Founded by a passionate perfumer who aimed to bring innovative scents to the market, the brand emphasizes quality ingredients and individual expression through fragrance. Mel Merio has garnered attention for its contemporary approach and a distinct aesthetic that combines both art and olfaction, appealing to discerning customers looking for something beyond conventional offerings.

name: Melanie Martinez
description: Melanie Martinez is a performer and creative known for her unique approach to music and self-expression. She has entered the fragrance market by launching her own perfume line, which captures her artistic and eclectic style. The fragrances often reflect her persona and themes present in her music, appealing to her dedicated fanbase who connect with her imagery and concept-driven artistry.

name: Meleg Parfum
description: Meleg Parfum is an artisan fragrance company that specializes in creating luxurious, high-quality perfumes. Founded in Istanbul, Turkey, the brand seeks to capture the essence of Middle Eastern culture through unique, handcrafted fragrances. Their story revolves around passion for perfumery and a commitment to using fine ingredients, appealing to a discerning clientele that values authenticity and artistry in scent.

name: Melinda Messenger
description: Melinda Messenger is a brand that emerged from the popularity of its founder, a well-known British television presenter and model. The company is particularly recognized for creating fragrances that target a broad audience, combining market trends with personal touches reflective of Messenger's persona. Their specialty lies in crafting scents that capture the essence of femininity, appealing to the everyday woman while maintaining a sense of luxury and elegance. Melinda Messenger aims to provide accessible yet refined fragrances that resonate with its consumers’ lifestyles.

name: Mellerio
description: Mellerio, founded in 1613, is a renowned French perfumery and jewelry house known for its exceptional craftsmanship and luxury creations. The company started as a jeweler and has maintained its reputation by incorporating high-quality fragrances into their offerings. Mellerio specializes in producing bespoke perfumes with a focus on personalization and artistry, often aligning their scent creations with their exquisite jewelry collections, making them a unique player in the perfume industry.

name: Melrose Place
description: Melrose Place is a luxury fragrance brand that embodies the essence of Los Angeles living, with a focus on artisanal craftsmanship and sophisticated scent profiles. Founded by a collective of fragrance enthusiasts, the company aims to create scents that evoke the lifestyle, culture, and vibrancy of Melrose Avenue. Their specialty lies in blending high-quality ingredients with contemporary design aesthetics, offering a unique sensory experience. Melrose Place emphasizes the importance of sustainability, using eco-friendly practices in their product development, and aims to connect with consumers seeking a modern yet classic fragrance experience.

name: Melt Season
description: Melt Season is a fragrance company that specializes in creating a unique blend of scents primarily focused on seasonal inspirations. The company aims to evoke emotions and memories through their carefully crafted perfumes, often influenced by various seasons, nature, and the changing environment. Established to cater to fragrance enthusiasts seeking distinctive and evocative blends, Melt Season prides itself on the sophistication and complexity of its offerings, appealing to a clientele that values artisanal and contemporary fragrance experiences.
address: 123 Fragrance Lane, New York, NY 10001, USA

name: Melvita
description: Melvita is a French brand known for its commitment to organic and natural beauty products, particularly in the fragrance and skincare sectors. Founded in 1983 by Bernard Chevilliat, the company emphasizes the use of high-quality, sustainably sourced botanical ingredients. With a philosophy rooted in ecological respect and the promotion of biodiversity, Melvita has become a pioneer in the organic cosmetic field, recognized for its eco-friendly practices and certifications. It offers a range of products including perfumes that highlight natural scents drawn from flowers, plants, and essential oils, catering to a mindful, health-conscious consumer base.

name: MEM Company
description: MEM Company specializes in creating unique and artisanal fragrances, drawing inspiration from cultural narratives and heritage. Founded by a group of passionate perfumers, the company aims to provide an experience that transcends the traditional perfume market by focusing on storytelling through scent. Their product line includes both personal fragrances and bespoke scent solutions for luxury venues.

name: Memo International
description: Memo International is a niche perfume house founded in 2007 specializing in high-quality, artisanal fragrances that evoke the spirit of travel and adventure. The brand is known for its innovative blends and unique storytelling through scent, often inspired by different cultures and locations. Memo's fragrances convey a sense of wanderlust through their luxurious compositions, crafted with a focus on rare and high-quality raw materials. Their signature style includes elaborate bottle designs and artistic presentations, drawing in fragrance enthusiasts who appreciate uniqueness and elegance.

name: Memo
description: Memo is a luxury niche perfume brand founded in 2006 by Clara and John Molloy. The brand specializes in unique fragrances inspired by travel and the rich tapestry of global cultures. Memo is known for its artisanal approach to perfumery, using high-quality ingredients to create distinct scents that evoke memories and places. The company has gained a reputation for its storytelling through fragrance, offering collections that transport wearers to different landscapes around the world, such as "Italian Leather" and "African Leather."
